extendedInfo.description: Take a salary cap of $40 and pick 12 basketball players you think will earn the most fantasy points.  Top winners earn in-game coins which can be redeemed to win real prizes such as Netflix and Amazon gift cards. Create your own NBA team and play against others in leagues of 14 in a daily & weekly contest. Your commissioner management skills will help your basketball team succeed! Your season starts when you join!  Voted the #1 Arcade-Style Fantasy Basketball Android gameWhether you are a fantasy basketball rookie, or a phenomenon, you can become the next big winner.Draft from all the best NBA players anytime on a salary cap, add and remove players from your lineup and bench at will, you don't need to waiver or propose a trade.   Just draft your team and watch your points add up! The perfect add-on to your season-long ESPN, Yahoo, or CBS fantasy basketball league.   You can draft a new team every day on a salary cap in daily and weekly contests all year.  A new breakout game by DraftKings.com the leaders in Fantasy Sports gameplay, featured on TechCrunch, RotoWire and more.  Play it today.  - Features - â Edit your entire lineup anytime â You are the manager of your own salary cap teamâ Trophy case! â No time to draft? reviews.title: Pretty Good...
reviews.comment: I\'ve just started so I\'m not sure if it\'s great, so I\'ll let u know...
reviews.author: Dana M Lizenby

reviews.title: No excitement  :-(
reviews.comment: I like Fantasy Sports for Coins, so when the \"get our new game\" popped up, I thought it would be just as much fun. I prefer playing against others, not solo. For the excitement this brings, I could write my selections down on a piece of paper...there is no difference other than eating up memory on my device.
reviews.author: Jane Rollins

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Great Game for anyone that likes fantasy sports!
reviews.author: Justin Weaver

reviews.comment: Awesome game runs great on s3
